content.description:
Ad quem1 tum Iuno supplexsupplex, -icis, f.: suppliant his vocibus usa est.
 1:refers to Aeolus (the mythical king of the winds)↩
content.question: In the sentence, what case is vocibus?

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
